C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

command:
rm -rf /usr/share/graylog/data/journal/lost+found
v1.28.0
wget https://dl.k8s.io/release/v1.28.0/bin/linux/amd64/kubectl -O /k8s/kubectl
chmod +x /k8s/kubectl

GRAYLOG_HOME=/usr/share/graylog
chown -R 1100:1100 ${GRAYLOG_HOME}/data/
initContainers.name: setup

controls.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles
